The face of CSS is rapidly changing.

Want to fuzz 0-255 chars in intruder?

2. Right click Hackvertor->String->from_charcode
3. Send to intruder
4. Clear placeholders
5. Move cursor inside from_charcode tag
6. Add placeholder
7. Use the payload type numbers
